text:
@realDonaldTrump When will this happen? How many years will it take you? Bc it sure isn’t great right now:

113K Americans dead from COVID-19
Pandemic still raging
27.5M ppl unemployed
Unemployment rate 16%
Black ppl murdered by cops
Mass protests against police brutality 

#BLM #DumpTrump2020
